attributes.action: Tell the gov business will reopen on the 2nd of Dec no matter what
attributes.additional_details: Were not asking we are telling
attributes.background: We are telling you that we will be reopening our businesses on the 2nd of December no matter what you say, the measures are manifestly excessive and are more damaging than the actual virus, we will not alllow our children's futures to be ruined.

rejection.details:
We can only accept a petition that includes a clear request for action by the UK Government or House of Commons.

We understand that you are concerned about the impact of current restrictions, but your petition does  not include a clear request for action.

If you are concerned about the current restrictions you might like to sign some of the following petitions:

Do not implement a second national lockdown or other restrictions this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539

Repeal second National Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045
